entity

Interface AddressBookConvertable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.pl.persistence.core.BeanMethods, BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Company, CompanyVendor, Contact, ContactCategoryScore, LegalVenue, Person, PersonVendor, Place, UserContact

    @Generated(value="com.guidewire.pl.metadata.codegen.Codegen",
           comments="AddressBookConvertable.eti;AddressBookConvertable.eix;AddressBookConvertable.etx")
public interface AddressBookConvertable
extends Bean
    AddressBookConvertable Indicates whether a Contact entity is linkable between a Guidewire application and ContactManager. This is an internal system entity.

    • Method Detail

      • canLinkTo

        @Deprecated
boolean canLinkTo(Contact addressBookContact)
        Deprecated. since ClaimCenter 8.0, there is no replacement
        Determines whether this AddressBookConvertable can link to the given Address Book Contact. A AddressBookConvertable can link to another Contact if the following conditions are met:
        • The Address Book Contact has an AddressBookUID.
        • The Address Book Contact, when converted into an AddressBookConvertable, is the same type or is a subtype of this AddressBookConvertable.
        Parameters:
        addressBookContact -

      • clearAddressBookFingerprint

        @Deprecated
void clearAddressBookFingerprint()
        Deprecated. 
        Clears the fingerprint value of this contact.

      • copyFromContact

        @Deprecated
AddressBookConvertable copyFromContact(Contact sourceContact)
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use syncToContactSystem() in ContactSystemUtil
        Copy data from contact to this AddressBookConvertable object.
        Parameters:
        sourceContact, - contact to copy information from
        Returns:
        this AddressBookConvertable filled with contact information

      • createInAddressBook

        @Deprecated
void createInAddressBook(boolean onlyPrimaryRelationships)
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use createContact() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Attempts to create a contact in the Address Book that has the same data as this AddressBookConvertable.
        Parameters:
        onlyPrimaryRelationships -
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException - if an Address Book adapter error occurs
        com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.InsufficientPermissionException - if the user does not have "createab Contact"
        EntityValidationException - if the new contact data is invalid for some reason.

      • deleteFromAddressBook

        @Deprecated
void deleteFromAddressBook()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, no longer available
        Attempts to delete the Address Book entry to which this AddressBookConvertable is linked.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException - if an Address Book adapter error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this AddressBookConvertable is not linked to the Address Book

      • generateContactLinkStatus

        @Deprecated
com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.ContactLinkStatus generateContactLinkStatus(Contact remoteContact,
                                                                                        Contact localContact)
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use generateContactLinkStatus() in ContactSystemUtil
        Generate the contact link status.
        Parameters:
        remoteContact - the Address Book entry corresponding to the localContact (may be null)
        localContact - the local contact
        Returns:
        The contact link status

      • generateLinkStatus

        @Deprecated
LinkStatus generateLinkStatus()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use generateLinkStatus() in ContactSystemUtil
        Gets this Contact's Address Book link status.

        Notice: Executing this method requires going over the wire to the addressbook, so if used in a pcf file it should only be used in the initialValue of a variable. For example: 

        <Variable name="linkStatus" initialValue="Contact==null ? null : Contact.generateLinkStatus()" recalculateOnRefresh="true"/>
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - On any problem with the addressbook, including if ContactManager is down.

      • getAddressBookFingerprint

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getAddressBookFingerprint()
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves the fingerprint for this contact.
        Returns:
        fingerprint value of this contact or null if no fingerprint defined.

      • getAddressBookUID

        java.lang.String getAddressBookUID()
        Gets the value of the AddressBookUID field. Represents the ID of the associated object in Address Book. Null if the object is not linked to Address Book.

      • getLinkedContact

        @Deprecated
Contact getLinkedContact()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use getLinkedContact() in ContactSystemUtil
        Gets the Address Book Contact to which this Contact is linked. Also brings related contacts in primary relationships with the linked contact.

        Performance note: This operation requires a remote access to the Address Book.

        Returns:
        null if the Contact is not linked to the Address Book or the link is broken.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException

      • linkAndSyncToAB

        @Deprecated
AddressBookConvertable linkAndSyncToAB(Contact contact)
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use ContactSystemUtil.linkToContactSystem
        Links to the given contact, and syncs, then commits in a bundle.
        Parameters:
        contact - - the contact to link and sync

void linkTo(Contact addressBookContact)

        Links this Contact to the given Address Book Contact.
        Parameters:
        addressBookContact -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this Contact can not be linked to the given Contact.

      • syncToAB

        @Deprecated
AddressBookConvertable syncToAB()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use syncToContactSystem() in ContactSystemUtil
        Update this AddressBookConvertable from the remote Address Book.
        Returns:
        the synced AddressBookConvertable. Note that this may be a different Java object than this AddressBookConvertable. This would happen if the Contact were downcast as part of the sync. Returns null if this AddressBookConvertable is not linked to the Address Book.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException

      • syncToABIfNeeded

        @Deprecated
AddressBookConvertable syncToABIfNeeded()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use syncToContactSystem() in ContactSystemUtil
        If the contact is linked and not in sync, update this AddressBookConvertable from the remote Address Book. This routine is more efficient than calling isLinked() and isSynced() then calling syncToAB(). It will make only one call to AB versus three calls for the other calls. .
        Returns:
        If updated, the synced AddressBookConvertable. Note that this may be a different Java object than this AddressBookConvertable. This would happen if the Contact were downcast as part of the sync. Returns null if this AddressBookConvertable is not linked to the Address Book. If not updated, returns 'this'

      • syncToABWithoutRelatedContacts

        @Deprecated
AddressBookConvertable syncToABWithoutRelatedContacts()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use syncToContactSystem() in ContactSystemUtil with false for syncRelatedContacts parameter
        Update this AddressBookConvertable from the remote Address Book without syncing related contacts. This is primarily used when you have a stub contact which is itself a related contact. When adding that stub contact to an application you need to sync the contact but you don't want to bring over it's related contacts as well, which would bring over too many contacts.
        Returns:
        the synced AddressBookConvertable. Note that this may be a different Java object than this AddressBookConvertable. This would happen if the Contact were downcast as part of the sync. Returns null if this AddressBookConvertable is not linked to the Address Book.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException

      • toContact

        @Deprecated
Contact toContact()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the representation of this addressBookConvertable as a Contact.
        Returns:
        version of this as a Contact

      • unlink

        void unlink()
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use ContactSystemUtil.unlinkFromContactSystem(Contact)
        Unlinks this AddressBookConvertable from the Address Book. This is done by marking this AddressBookConvertable out of sync, and clearing the AddressBookUID field on every linked sub-object.

      • updateAddressBook

        @Deprecated
void updateAddressBook(boolean onlyPrimaryRelationships)
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0, use updateContact() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Pushes the changes made on this AddressBookConvertable to the Address Book. Changes are determined by looking up the latest data in the Address Book and diffing it with the data on this AddressBookConvertable.
        Parameters:
        onlyPrimaryRelationships -
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException - if an Address Book adapter error occurs
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookContactNotFoundException - if the corresponding Contact could not be found in the Address Book.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this AddressBookConvertable is not linked to the Address Book
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookConcurrentDataChangeException - if the Address Book has been modified since this AddressBookConvertable was last synced with the Address Book
        com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.InsufficientPermissionException - if the user does not have "editab Contact" permission.
        EntityValidationException - if the data in the update is invalid for some reason.
